message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product for the price of $13,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $10,000? I'm really interested in the product and I think we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
